messages.subject: food discussion
messages.msgSnippet: I just have to say that this group is like a breath of fresh air for me. This discussion about food could have so easily gone off track and gotten nasty. And
messages.messageBody:
I just have to say that this group is like a breath of fresh air for me. This discussion about food could have so easily gone off track and gotten nasty. And yet it didn't. It could have easily brushed past the parts of the topic that were difficult. And yet it didn't do that either.

The back and forth, questioning and clarification has been so wonderful to read. Thank you to everyone who participated in such a reasonable fashion. It's left me thinking and that's always good.

And all without leaving a bad taste in my mouth. <g>

--
~Mary, unschooling mom to Conor (16) and Casey (11)
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/CorvallisTLC/


"The miracle is not to walk on water. The miracle is to walk on the
green earth, dwelling deeply in the present moment and feeling truly
alive."
